00001 package prog.assignment.gol.board;

00003 import java.util.List;

00005 import prog.assignment.gol.IConstants;
00006 import prog.assignment.gol.Logger;

00013 public class ArrayListBoard extends AbstractBoard{
00014 
00015         
00016         public static Board getInstance() {
00017                 return new ArrayListBoard();
00018         }
00019 
00020         private ListOfList cellMatrix;
00021         
00025         private ArrayListBoard(){
00026         }
00027         
00028         public Board initializeFromSize(int xSize, int ySize){
00029                 //Logger.logLine(Logger.DEBUG, "Initializing new board of size " + xSize + "," + ySize);
00030                 
00031                 cellMatrix = new ListOfList(xSize,ySize); 
00032                 
00033                 //add all neighbours for all cells              
00034                 for(int x = 0; x < xSize; x++){
00035                         for(int y = 0; y < ySize; y++){         
00036                                 for(int i = x-1; i <= x+1; i++){
00037                                         for(int j = y-1; j <= y+1; j++){
00038                                                 if(i == x && j==y) continue;
00039                                                 if( i < 0 || j < 0 ||
00040                                                         i >= xSize || j >= ySize) continue;
00041                                                 //Logger.logLine("Neighbour of [" + x + ',' + y + ']' + '[' + i + ',' + j + ']');
00042                                                 cellMatrix.getCell(x,y).addNeighbour(getCell(i,j));
00043                                         }
00044                                 }
00045                         }
00046                 }
00047             return this;
00048         }
00049         
00050         public int getXSize() {
00051                 return cellMatrix.getXSize();
00052         }
00053 
00054         public int getYSize() {
00055                 return cellMatrix.getYSize();
00056         }
00057         
00061         public Cell getCell(int x, int y){
00062                 return cellMatrix.getCell(x,y);
00063         }
00064         
00065 
00073         @Override
00074         public Board copyStateFrom(List<String> dataList){
00075                 for(int y = 0; y<getYSize() && y<dataList.size(); y++){
00076                         String row = dataList.get(y);
00077                         String [] rowElements = row.split(IConstants.SEPARATOR);
00078                         for(int x = 0; x<getXSize() && x<rowElements.length; x++){
00079                                 if(rowElements[x].equals(IConstants.ALIVE_CHAR)){
00080                                         getCell(x,y).setState(true);
00081                                 }
00082                         }
00083                 }
00084                 return this;
00085         }
00086         
00094         @Override
00095         public Board copyStateFrom(Board board){
00096                 //The prev generation board is 2 sizes smaller
00097                 for(int i = 0; i < getXSize()-2; i++){
00098                         for(int j = 0; j < getYSize()-2; j++){
00099                                 if(board.getCell(i, j).getState()){
00100                                         getCell(i+1,j+1).setState(true);
00101                                 }
00102                         }
00103                 }
00104                 return this;
00105         }
00106         
00107         @Override
00108         public void pruneBoard(){
00109                 cellMatrix.prune();
00110         }
00111         
00112         @Override
00113         public String display(){
00114                 StringBuffer result = new StringBuffer();
00115                 
00116                 for(int y = 0; y < getYSize(); y++){
00117                         StringBuffer line = new StringBuffer();
00118                         for(int x = 0; x < getXSize(); x++){
00119                                 if(getCell(x,y).isAlive()){
00120                                         line.append(IConstants.ALIVE_CHAR).append(' ');
00121                                         Logger.log(Logger.DEBUG, IConstants.ALIVE_CHAR + " ");
00122                                 } else {
00123                                         line.append(IConstants.DEAD_CHAR).append(' ');
00124                                         Logger.log(Logger.DEBUG, IConstants.DEAD_CHAR + " ");
00125                                 }
00126                         }
00127                         Logger.log(Logger.DEBUG, "\n");
00128                         result.append(line.toString()).append("\n");
00129                 }
00130                 
00131                 return result.toString();
00132         }
00133         
00137         public String toString(){
00138                 return cellMatrix.toString();
00139         }
